normalized: in a time far in the future.
an era when mankind has begun to span the cosmos.
new planets in the solar system have appeared through frequent terraforming, spreading mankind's influence throughout the solar system.
spreading humanity throughout space had naturally brought about a transition in human history.
people who weren't born on earth were called "space aliens", and in order to revise the doctrines and principles governing earth…
the universal federal government was inaugurated as having dominion over colonized planets and it was that one symbolic event that held such a significance.
thus, mankind's re-unification established peace for about a decade.
in contrast to that great initiative, the space aliens held deep-rooted antagonism towards the earth-born citizens who were pushing their interests on them.
as a symbol of that, two political groups formed amongst the universal federation.
namely, the "neo terrors", composed of former earth-born humans, and the "new solars", composed of humans not born on earth.
comprised of politicians, the two formed their own police and army organizations, and while showing hate towards the other, it wasn't long before the situation exploded.
my name is donny bohgan.
i am a universal federation army major, and captain of battleship jasant in charge of transporting key figures.
presently, i was just about to undertake a new mission from headquarters.

name: general
normalized: major bohgan.
i would have given you advanced notice, but this mission is of the utmost importance.

name: bohgan
normalized: …i understand
i sat in front of the communications monitor, facing the general through the display.

name: general
normalized: the truth is, there are figures who hold our, the neo terrors', secrets, and i have received intelligence that they intend on exposing them.

name: bohgan
normalized: exposing…the neo terrors' secrets…?

name: general
normalized: as always, i will entrust the military operation details to you.
no matter what it takes, i need you to interdict their plans.

name: bohgan
normalized: understood.
please leave it to me
with me saying that, the general nodded, looking pleased.

name: general
normalized: all right.
well, let me explain the details
and now, a few hours later.
in order to explain the mission to my crew, i called each of the department's management to the jasant's military operations room.

name: bohgan
normalized: this time--it's a secret mission

name: subordinates
normalized: …ohh!
with the very first utterance from my mouth, my subordinates whistled, becoming instantly excited.
a vulgar curiosity came upon each of the field specialist's faces.
the crew of the jasant and i had a hidden persona.
we are a special work force belonging to the neo terrors, specializing in illegal tasks by way of sabotage and assassination.
the neo terrors harbor many extremely patriotic young men, and accomplishing secret missions seems to rightly motivate their feverish loyalty and patriotism.
although…it's not just that, they have other expectations as well…

name: bohgan
normalized: now the target is, the young and energetic talented women of the new solars--

name: bohgan
normalized: the famous and lovely woman officer, commander lieri bishop

name: subordinates
normalized: ohh!?

name: bohgan
normalized: and as a bonus, her aide, major naomi evans.
aren't they young, charismatic women soldiers?
it sure looks like it

name: subordinates
normalized: those women?
they're perfect!

name: subordinate 1
normalized: banzai, captain!
new solar dirty bitches!

name: subordinate 2
normalized: hehehee!
i'm going to train them plentifully!

name: subordinate 3
normalized: did you hear what that woman said on tv!
uhyohyohyohyoohh!
while my subordinates dispersed vulgar words unanimously, they remained in a high-spirited mania for a while.
i looked around calmly, a cruel smile forming on my lips at them like that.
speaking of lieri bishop, there was no other celebrity like her now.
she was born of a distinguished family on planet titan.
a senior investigator belonging to the army military police investigation department, she holds calm judgment, gifted with both intelligence and beauty.
she being the most celebrated amongst the new solars, is often seen on tv and the like, and is a wonderfully charismatic, talented woman.
naomi evans is no push-over either.
she is lieri bishop's loyal aide, and a very talented woman soldier holding glorious deeds of valor against the neo terrors.
as such, hearing the names of the woman soldiers who have been a thorn in the neo terrors' sides, it wasn't surprising that my subordinates had gotten so excited.

name: bohgan
normalized: well then, let me explain the details
saying that, the officers fell dead silent again, swelling up with tension.

name: bohgan
normalized: i have received information that lieri bishop has ascertained the illegal activity being carried out by important neo terror politicians working behind the scenes.

name: subordinate 1
normalized: illegal, activity…?

name: bohgan
normalized: that's right.
furthermore, she has arranged to prosecute using that evidence in a federal government meeting being held in one week.
my subordinates were stirring in quite a different fashion than before.

name: subordinate 2
normalized: chi!
she's bluffing!

name: subordinate 3
normalized: seems like it, she's planning on trying to force us into making a mistake, isn't she?

name: bohgan
normalized: that is still to be decided.
the point is, if commander bishop drops that bomb, it will allow the rise of even more new solars.
an audacious groaning leaked out like a curse from the officers.

name: bohgan
normalized: so--it's our move
in order to control my subordinates who were beginning to get hot heads, i persisted in maintaining a calm and collected voice as i informed them.

name: bohgan
normalized: tomorrow, this warship will be visiting planet titan and picking up commander lieri bishop and major naomi evans en route to earth.

name: bohgan
normalized: it will be about 7 days time until we reach earth.
in that time, we're going to use the equipment on this warship to give them one hell of a reception.
my subordinates responded with nothing but ominous smiles at those words of mine.

name: bohgan
normalized: …kukuku, gentlemen, it will be brainwashing training as you were expecting
a noisy excitement filtered out from my subordinates.
some of them already had flushed faces and one person was cracking his knuckles.
i curved my lips in a broad grin looking over them like that.
good.
as for the brainwashing missions to those targeted, the crew of the jasant had quite a specialty in that.
although it might be too much in saying that the neo terrors invented it, they had accumulated the brainwashing know-how in secret-like scholarship research.
i, as the leading person in that field, was quickly establishing a name for myself in the illegal underworld.

name: subordinate 2
normalized: kukuu, i'm looking forward to this

name: subordinate 3
normalized: hehee…aah, it already seems a little unbearable having to wait now
a wicked inquisitiveness seeped out from the officer's faces.
in cases where women were the brainwashing targets, it was something like being the rudimentary abc's of brainwashing missions.
--sex training.
by controlling the cranial nerves by means of a woman's sexual desires, you could remold them an entirely different personality.
my subordinates were really looking forward to exposing them to the spaceship of just men, and raping the new solar women, even if they did give in…
that, in a way, wasn't unlikely…
the meeting finished, the managing officers had returned to their posts.
i, being the only one left in the room, enlarged the data sent from the control room and floated a crafty smile as i leaned back in my chair.

name: bohgan
normalized: come now, how will i make you change… lieri bishop…fufufuu
i finished reading the data concerning lieri and dropped my gaze to the data regarding her little sidekick.

name: bohgan
normalized: …major evans.
why do you look up to lieri so much…
i smiled like ridiculing her as i remembered major evans' face in my memory.
--naomi evans.
originally, the eldest daughter of the house associating with house bishop, but spending her time as a child with lieri, she walked in her footsteps.
naturally, they went to the same military academy.
lieri may be naomi's senior, but it seems that they think of each other as true sisters.

name: bohgan
normalized: the new solars' most prized combo, like true, loving sisters… kukukukuu…
i've been waiting for an opportunity like this for a long time.
it seems to be the case.
the truth is, them and me hold a deep connection.
